attributes.action: By-elections for all MPs that stood for Labour in 2017 and remain in the party
attributes.additional_details:
As said by Jeremy Corbyn “these MP’s want to abandon the policies on which they were elected so the decent and democratic thing for them to do is to resign and put themselves up for election”

As these Labour MP’s want to stay within a party which is “institutionally antisemitic” which goes against their manifesto they should do the “decent and democratic thing” and “put themselves up for election.”
attributes.background:
Labour stood on a manifestio which said “Anti-Semitic incidents are also on the rise once more and we are committed to combating this trend with adequate resources and firm political will.”

However MPs have left the party because it is “institutionally antisemitic”

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for the MPs concerned and not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
